page.title: 01PADSTOW AND ITS SURROUNDS
page.content: The area covered by the block includes the village of{Trevone}and part of the town of{Padstow.Trevone}is mainly residential,much of it built just before and since the 2nd World War;it is a sandy cove much used by tourists and local people alike due to easy access to the beach.{Padstow}is an ancient port of around 2500 people world famous for its{'OBBY 'OSS} celebrations on May 1st.The majority of the land is given over to { {intensified grassland grazing and {rough pasture grazing for cattle and {sheep plus the growing of crops- in {particular winter barley.}The area relies a lot upon the{summer tourists} who come for the sandy beaches, sailing,water-skiing and board-sailing on the Estuary,walking along the coast paths and watching the comings and goings associated with a harbour&port.
